title: Moon In The Void
alternative_title:
虚空の月 ; 
        Kokuu no Tsuki
status:
虚空の月 ; 
        Kokuu no Tsuki
description:
Description :
        "You’ll be taking the test in my bed, if you catch my drift?"Detective Higa is on a leave of absence investigating Sei Shido, an officer in the Ichikura-gumi gang and a person of interest in a particular case. He goes undercover to ask him for a job, and discovers that despite his intimidating presence, Shido is a beautiful man who oozes wanton sex appeal. After an initial rejection, Higa throws himself in front of an assassin's bullet and earns himself the position of Shido's bodyguard, on one condition: he has to have sex with him...?!Loneliness and obsession collide in this suspenseful love story from hard-boiled BL pioneer Saki Aida and talented up-and-coming artist Rou Nishimoto!
